skills.name: Zone Suppression
desc:
Deals Ice DMG equal to **60%** of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% **base chance** to inflict Exposed on all enemies.
When Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by **30%** for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Data Collecting
desc: If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **5.0** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **5.5** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **6.0** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **6.5** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **7.0** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **7.5** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **8.1** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.
If the enemy is **debuffed** after Pela's attack, Pela will restore **8.8** extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

skills.name: Preemptive Strike
desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to 80% of her ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% **base chance** of lowering the DEF of all enemies by 20% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Victory Report
eidolons.desc: When Pela defeats an enemy, Pela regenerates 5 Energy.

eidolons.name: Adamant Charge
eidolons.desc: Using Skill to remove buff(s) increases SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Suppressive Force
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Full Analysis
eidolons.desc: When using Skill, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the target enemy's Ice RES by 12% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Absolute Jeopardy
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Feeble Pursuit
eidolons.desc: When Pela attacks a debuffed enemy, she deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 40% of Pela's ATK to the enemy.

skillTree.name: Bash
skillTree.desc: Deals 20% more DMG to debuffed enemies.

skillTree.name: The Secret Strategy
skillTree.desc: When Pela is on the battlefield, all allies' Effect Hit Rate increases by 10%.

skillTree.name: Wipe Out
skillTree.desc: Using Skill to remove buff(s) increases the DMG of the next attack by 20%.
